dcterms:creator: V. N. Kolokoltsov
A. Bensoussan
dcterms:description: A mean-field-game model for botnet defense in cyber-security, focusing on the dynamics of a large group of computers that can be either defended or undefended and infected or susceptible to infection.
dcterms:title: Cyber security model

dcterms:creator: N. Almulla
R. Ferreira
D. Gomes
dcterms:description: A model of swarm motion with aversion to crowded regions, focusing on the dynamics of agents in a continuous space and their interactions based on density.
dcterms:title: Swarm motion
